statements: SELECT * FROM grant_details
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE approval_deadline > '2022-01-01'
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE application_deadline < '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM grant_details ORDER BY grant_amount DESC
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, application_deadline FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount > 1000 ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, application_deadline FROM grant_details WHERE application_deadline < '2022-10-31' AND approval_deadline > '2022-09-30';
SELECT * FROM grant_details WHERE grant_name LIKE '%scholarship%';

SELECT grant_id, grant_name, grant_amount, application_deadline, approval_deadline FROM grant_details WHERE grant_id IN (101, 105, 110) AND approval_deadline < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY application_deadline ASC;
SELECT grant_id, grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount >= 500 AND grant_amount <= 2000 ORDER BY grant_amount ASC, grant_name DESC;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_id = 1;
SELECT grant_name, grant_deadline FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM grant_details WHERE grant_deadline < '2022-06-30';
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, grant_deadline FROM grant_details ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 8000;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount > 5000 ORDER BY grant_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_details WHERE grant_deadline > '2022-08-31' ORDER BY grant_deadline ASC, grant_amount DESC;

SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, grant_deadline FROM grant_details INNER JOIN grant_deadlines ON grant_details.grant_id = grant_deadlines.grant_id WHERE deadline_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY grant_deadline ASC;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount BETWEEN 3000 AND 7000 ORDER BY grant_deadline DESC;

SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, deadline_date FROM grant_details INNER JOIN grant_deadlines ON grant_details.grant_id = grant_deadlines.grant_id WHERE grant_name LIKE '%research%' ORDER BY deadline_date ASC, grant_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_details;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT recipient_name, award_amount, award_date FROM grant_recipients WHERE award_amount > 5000;
SELECT grant_id, reviewer_name, review_date FROM grant_reviews WHERE review_comments IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM grant_details WHERE application_deadline > NOW();
SELECT * FROM grant_details ORDER BY grant_amount DESC;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE application_deadline > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT recipient_name, award_amount, award_date FROM grant_recipients WHERE award_amount > 5000 ORDER BY award_date;
SELECT grant_name, review_date, review_comments FROM grant_details JOIN grant_reviews ON grant_details.grant_id = grant_reviews.grant_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date, grant_name FROM grant_reviews JOIN grant_details ON grant_reviews.grant_id = grant_details.grant_id ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM grant_details;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grant_details WHERE grant_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM grant_management ORDER BY manager_name DESC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_status FROM grant_applications WHERE application_status = 'approved';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_comments FROM grant_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount, deadline FROM grant_details WHERE deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM grant_management ORDER BY manager_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, applicant_name, application_date, application_status FROM grant_applications WHERE application_status = 'approved';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name, review_comments, review_date, recommendation FROM grant_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;

SELECT G.grant_name, A.applicant_name, R.reviewer_name FROM grant_details G JOIN grant_applications A ON G.grant_id = A.grant_id JOIN grant_reviews R ON A.application_id = R.application_id WHERE R.recommendation = 'Accepted';
SELECT * FROM grants;
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_deadline > '2022-01-01';
SELECT grant_name, grant_description FROM grants ORDER BY grant_name DESC;
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email FROM grant_applicants WHERE applicant_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT review_id, reviewer_id, review_date, review_score FROM grant_reviews WHERE review_score > 4;
SELECT * FROM grants WHERE grant_amount > 5000
SELECT grant_name, grant_amount FROM grants WHERE grant_deadline >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT applicant_name, applicant_email, grant_name FROM grant_applicants INNER JOIN grants ON grant_applicants.grant_id = grants.grant_id
SELECT review_score, review_comments FROM grant_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY review_score DESC
SELECT grant_name, status, status_date FROM grants INNER JOIN grant_status ON grants.grant_id = grant_status.grant_id
